text: @charliekirk11 @KristiNoem Hey Chuck, why don't you don a mask, gloves and gown & volunteer your time helping COVID19 patients? Because you're a coward. It's much easier to be well-protected in your home & allow others to do the job you could never do. Ur a mouthpiece for Republicans. No brain. No balls.
